entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 2:40PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: Strong high pressure combined with a temperature inversion over the Anchorage Bowl will result in patchy dense fog (visibility of one quarter mile or less) over the next 2-3 days. Fog will be thickest in the lower lying areas, especially at night.
